title: Bless the Lord oh my soul
lyrics:
[Chorus]
Bless the Lord oh my soul
Oh my soul
Worship His Holy name
Sing like never before
Oh my soul
I'll worship Your Holy name

[Verse]
The sun comes up
It's a new day dawning
It's time to sing Your song again
Whatever may pass
And whatever lies before me
Let me be singing
When the evening comes

[Chorus]
Bless the Lord oh my soul
Oh my soul
Worship His Holy name
Sing like never before
Oh my soul
I'll worship Your Holy name

[Verse]
You're rich in love
And You're slow to anger
Your name is great
And Your heart is kind
For all Your goodness
I will keep on singing
Ten thousand reasons
For my heart to find

[Chorus]
Bless the Lord oh my soul
Oh my soul
Worship His Holy name
Sing like never before
Oh my soul
I'll worship Your Holy name
Bless You Lord

[Verse]
And on that day
When my strength is failing
The end draws near
And my time has come
Still my soul will
Sing Your praise unending
Ten thousand years
And then forevermore
Forevermore

[Chorus]
Bless the Lord oh my soul
Oh my soul
Worship His Holy name
Sing like never before
Oh my soul
I'll worship Your Holy name

[Bridge]
Bless the Lord oh my soul
Oh my soul
Worship His Holy name
Sing like never before
Oh my soul
I'll worship Your Holy name
Yes I'll worship Your Holy name
I'll worship Your Holy name

[Verse]
Sing like never before
Oh my soul
I'll worship Your Holy name
Jesus I will worship Your Holy name
Worship Your Holy name

title: Blessed be the name of the Lord
lyrics:
[Chorus]
Blessed be the name of the Lord
He is worthy to be praised and adored
So we lift up holy hands in one accord
Singing blessed be the name
Blessed be the name
Blessed be the name of the Lord

[Chorus]
Blessed be the name of the Lord
He is worthy to be praised and adored
So we lift up holy hands in one accord
Singing blessed be the name
Blessed be the name
Blessed be the name of the Lord

[Chorus]
Blessed be the name of the Lord
He is worthy to be praised and adored
So we lift up holy hands in one accord
Singing blessed be the name
Blessed be the name
Blessed be the name of the Lord

title: Blessed Be Your Name
lyrics:
[Verse]
Blessed Be Your Name
In the land that is plentiful
Where Your streams of abundance flow
Blessed be Your name
Blessed Be Your name
When I'm found in the desert place
Though I walk through the wilderness
Blessed Be Your name

[Verse]
Every blessing You pour out
I'll turn back to praise
When the darkness closes in, Lord
Still I will say
Blessed be the name of the Lord
Blessed be Your name
Blessed be the name of the Lord
Blessed be Your glorious name

[Verse]
Blessed be Your name
When the sun's shining down on me
When the world's 'all as it should be'
Blessed be Your name
Blessed be Your name
On the road marked with suffering
Though there's pain in the offering
Blessed be Your name

[Verse]
Every blessing You pour out
I'll turn back to praise
When the darkness closes in, Lord
Still I will say
Blessed be the name of the Lord
Blessed be Your name
Blessed be the name of the Lord
Blessed be Your glorious name
Blessed be the name of the Lord
Blessed be Your name
Blessed be the name of the Lord
Blessed be Your glorious name

[Tag]
You give and take away
You give and take away
My heart will choose to say
Lord, blessed be Your name
You give and take away
You give and take away
My heart will choose to say
Lord, blessed be Your name

[Tag]
You give and take away
You give and take away
My heart will choose to say
Lord, blessed be Your name

[Verse]
Blessed be the name of the Lord
Blessed be Your name
Blessed be the name of the Lord
Blessed be Your glorious name

[Verse]
Blessed be the name of the Lord
(You give and take away)
Blessed be Your name
(You give and take away)
Blessed be the name of the Lord
(My heart will choose to say)
Blessed be Your glorious name

[Verse]
Blessed be Your name
To the rising of the sun over us
To the setting of the same
Though ther's pain on the offering

title: Give thanks with a grateful heart
lyrics:
[Chorus]
Give thanks with a grateful heart
Give thanks to the Holy One
Give thanks because He's given Jesus Christ, His Son

[Chorus]
Give thanks with a grateful heart
Give thanks to the Holy One
Give thanks because He's given Jesus Christ, His Son

[Bridge]
And now let the weak say, "I am strong"
Let the poor say, "I am rich
Because of what the Lord has done for us"

[Bridge]
And now let the weak say, "I am strong"
Let the poor say, "I am rich
Because of what the Lord has done for us"

[Chorus]
Give thanks with a grateful heart (with a grateful heart)
Give thanks to the Holy One (to the Holy One)
Give thanks because He's given Jesus Christ, His Son

[Chorus]
Give thanks with a grateful heart (with a grateful heart)
Give thanks to the Holy One (to the Holy One)
Give thanks because He's given Jesus Christ, His Son

[Bridge]
And now let the weak say, "I am strong"
Let the poor say, "I am rich
Because of what the Lord has done for us"

[Bridge]
And now let the weak say, "I am strong"
Let the poor say, "I am rich (I am rich)
Because of what the Lord has done for us"
Give thanks

title: I raise a hallelujah (hallelujah)
lyrics:
[Verse]
ಐ ರೇಸ್ ಎ ಹಲ್ಲೆಲೂಯಾ
ಇನ್ ದ ಪ್ರೆಸೆನ್ಸ್ ಆಫ್ ಮೈ ಎನಿಮೀಸ್
ಐ ರೇಸ್ ಎ ಹಲ್ಲೆಲೂಯಾ
ಲೌಡರ್ ದ್ಯಾನ್ ದ ಅನ್ಬಿಲೀಫ್
ಐ ರೇಸ್ ಎ ಹಲ್ಲೆಲೂಯಾ
I raise a hallelujah
In the presence of my enemies
I raise a hallelujah
Louder than the unbelief
I raise a hallelujah

[Verse]
ಮೈ ವೆಪನ್ ಇಸ್ ಅ ಮೆಲಡಿ
ಐ ರೇಸ್ ಎ ಹಲ್ಲೆಲೂಯಾ
ಹೆವನ್ ಕಮ್ಸ್ ಟು ಫೈಟ್ ಫಾರ್ ಮಿ
My weapon is a melody
I raise a hallelujah
Heaven comes to fight for me

[Chorus]
ಐಮ್ ಗೋನ್ನಾ ಸಿಂಗ್ ಇನ್ ದ ಮಿಡಲ್ ಆಫ್ ದ ಸ್ಟಾರ್ಮ್
ಲೌಡರ್ ಅಂಡ್ ಲೌಡರ್, ಯೂರ್ ಗೊನ್ನಾ ಹಿಯರ್ ಮೈ ಪ್ರೈಸಸ್ ರೋರ್
ಅಪ್ ಫ್ರಂ ದ ಆಶೆಸ್ ಹೋಪ್ ವಿಲ್ ಅರೈಸ್
ಡೆತ್ ಇಸ್ ಡಿಫೀಟೆಡ್, ದ ಕಿಂಗ್ ಇಸ್ ಅಲೈವ್
I'm gonna sing in the middle of the storm
Louder and louder, you're gonna hear my praises roar
Up from the ashes hope will arise
Death is defeated, the King is alive

[Verse]
ಐ ರೇಸ್ ಎ ಹಲ್ಲೆಲೂಯಾ
ವಿತ್ ಎವೆರಿಥಿಂಗ್ ಇನ್ಸೈಡ್ ಆಫ್ ಮಿ
ಐ ರೇಸ್ ಎ ಹಲ್ಲೆಲೂಯಾ
ಐ ವಿಲ್ ವಾಚ್ ದ ಡಾರ್ಕ್ನೆಸ್ ಫ್ಲೀ
ಐ ರೇಸ್ ಎ ಹಲ್ಲೆಲೂಯಾ
ಇನ್ ದ ಮಿಡಲ್ ಆಫ್ ದ ಮಿಸ್ಟರಿ
ಐ ರೇಸ್ ಎ ಹಲ್ಲೆಲೂಯಾ
ಫಿಯರ್, ಯೂ ಲಾಸ್ಟ್ ಯೂರ್ ಹೋಲ್ಡ್ ಆನ್ ಮಿ
I raise a hallelujah
With everything inside of me
I raise a hallelujah
I will watch the darkness flee
I raise a hallelujah
In the middle of the mystery
I raise a hallelujah
Fear, you lost your hold on me

[Chorus]
ಐಮ್ ಗೊನ್ನಾ ಸಿಂಗ್ ಇನ್ ದ ಮಿಡಲ್ ಆಫ್ ದ ಸ್ಟಾರ್ಮ್
ಲೌಡರ್ ಅಂಡ್ ಲೌಡರ್, ಯೂರ್ ಗನ್ನಾ ಹಿಯರ್ ಮೈ ಪ್ರೈಸಸ್ ರೋರ್
ಅಪ್ ಫ್ರಂ ದ ಆಶೆಸ್ ಹೋಪ್ ವಿಲ್ ಅರೈಸ್
ಡೆತ್ ಇಸ್ ಡಿಫೀಟೆಡ್, ದ ಕಿಂಗ್ ಇಸ್ ಅಲೈವ್
I'm gonna sing in the middle of the storm
Louder and louder, you're gonna hear my praises roar
Up from the ashes hope will arise
Death is defeated, the King is alive

[Tag]
ಸಿಂಗ್ ಎ ಲಿಟಲ್ ಲೌಡರ್
ಸಿಂಗ್ ಎ ಲಿಟಲ್ ಲೌಡರ್

ಓ, ಸಿಂಗ್ ಎ ಲಿಟಲ್ ಲೌಡರ್

Sing a little louder
Sing a little louder
Sing a little louder
Sing a little louder
Sing a little louder
Sing a little louder

[Verse]

title: I’m trading my sorrows
lyrics:
[Chorus]
I’m trading my sorrows
I’m trading my shame
I’m laying them down for the joy of the Lord
I’m trading my sickness
I’m trading my pain
I’m laying them down for the joy of the Lord

This is my desire
To honor you
Lord will all my heart
I worship you
All I have with in me
I give you praise
All that I adore is in you

This is my desire
To honor you
Lord will all my heart
I worship you
All I have with in me
I give you praise
All that I adore is in you



Lord I give you my heart
I give you my soul
I live for you alone
Every breath that I take
Every moment I m awake
Lord have your way in me

[Tag]
Yes Lord, yes Lord, yes yes Lord
Yes Lord, yes Lord, yes yes Lord
Yes Lord, yes Lord, yes yes Lord, Amen

[Verse]
I am pressed but not crushed
Persecuted not abandoned
Struck down but not destroyed
I am blessed beyond the curse
For His promise will endure
That His joy is gonna be my strength
Though the sorrow may last for the night
His joy comes in the morning              || Yes Lord ||

[Chorus]
I’m trading my sorrows
I’m trading my shame
I’m laying them down for the joy of the Lord
I’m trading my sickness
I’m trading my pain
I’m laying them down for the joy of the Lord     || Yes Lord ||

title: Let everything That has breath
lyrics:
[Verse]
Let everything
That has breath
Praise the Lord (you got it)
Praise the Lord

[Verse]
Let everything (let everything)
(Hey) that has breath
(Hey) praise the Lord
(Hey) praise the Lord

[Verse]
I'll praise in the valley
Praise on the mountain (yeah)
I'll praise when I'm sure
Praise when I'm doubting (yes, sir)

[Verse]
I'll praise when outnumbered
Praise when surrounded
'Cause praise is the water
My enemies drown in

[Chorus]
As long as I'm breathing
I've got a reason to
Praise the Lord
Oh, my soul (c'mon)
Praise the Lord
Oh, my soul (hey)

[Verse]
I'll praise when I feel it
And I'll praise when I don't
I'll praise 'cause I know
You're still in control
Because my praise is a weapon
It's more than a sound (more than a sound)
Oh, my praise is the shout
That brings Jericho down (oh)

[Chorus]
As long as I'm breathing
I've got a reason to
Praise the Lord (c'mon)
Oh, my soul
(So I'm gonna) praise the Lord
Oh, my soul

[Verse]
I won't be quiet, my God is alive
So how could I keep it inside?
Praise the Lord
Oh, my soul
(Praise the Lord)

[Bridge]
I'll praise 'cause You're sovereign
Praise 'cause You reign
Praise 'cause You rose and defeated the grave
I'll praise 'cause You're faithful
Praise 'cause You're true
Praise 'cause there's nobody greater than You, I'll pray

[Bridge]
I'll praise 'cause You're sovereign
(You reign) praise 'cause You reign
Praise 'cause You rose and defeated the grave
I'll praise 'cause You're faithful
Praise 'cause You're true
Praise 'cause there's nobody greater than You

[Verse]
Praise the Lord
Oh, my soul (come on, come on, come on, come on)
I gotta praise the Lord
Oh, my soul
Praise the Lord
Oh, my soul (yes, my Lord)
Praise the Lord
Oh, my soul

[Verse]
I won't be quiet, my God is alive
How could I keep it inside?
(Oh, I won't be quiet)
I won't be quiet (my God)
My God is alive (how could I?)
How could I keep it inside?
(Oh, I won't be quiet)
I won't be quiet, my God is alive
How could I keep it inside?

[Verse]
I gotta praise the Lord
Oh, my soul

[Verse]
Let everything
That has breath
Hey, hey (praise the Lord)
Hey, hey (praise the Lord)
Let everything (let everything)
Come on, come on (that has breath)
Come on, come on (praise the Lord)
Come on, come on (praise the Lord)
Let everything (let everything)

title: Light of the world
lyrics:
[Verse]
Light of the world
You stepped down into darkness
Opened my eyes, let me see
Beauty that made this heart adore You
Hope of a life spent with You

[Verse]
Here I am to worship
Here I am to bow down
Here I am to say that You're my God

[Verse]
You're altogether lovely
Altogether worthy
Altogether wonderful to me

Here I am to worship
Here I am to bow down
Here I am to say that You're my God

You're altogether lovely
Altogether worthy
Altogether wonderful to me

 I never know how much it cost
To see my sin upon that cross
l never know how much it cost
To see my sin upon that cross


Well, I'll never know how much it cost
To see my sin upon that cross
Well, I'll never know how much it cost
To see my sin upon that cross

[Verse]
King of all days
Oh, so highly exalted
Glorious in heaven above
Humbly You came to the earth You created
All for love's sake became poor

title: This is the day, this is the day.
lyrics:
[Verse]
This is the day, this is the day
That the Lord has made
That the Lord has made
We will rejoice, we will rejoice
And be glad in it, and be glad in it
This is the day that the Lord has made
We will rejoice and be glad in it
This is the day, this is the day
That the Lord has made

[Verse]
We are the sons, we are the sons
Of the living God, of the living God
We will rejoice, we will rejoice
And be glad in Him, and be glad in Him
We are the sons of the living God
We will rejoice and be glad in Him
We are the sons, we are the sons
Of the living God

 16If one of you says to them, “Go in peace; keep warm and well fed,” but does nothing about their physical needs, what good is it? 
17In the same way, faith by itself, if it is not accompanied by action, is dead.


Offer hospitality to one another without grumbling. 

 17If anyone has material possessions and sees a brother or sister in need but has no pity on them, how can the love of God be in that person? 18Dear children, let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

title: When the music fades All is stripped away
lyrics:
[Verse]
When the music fades
All is stripped away
And I simply come
Longing just to bring
Something that's of worth
That will bless Your heart
I'll bring You more than a song
For a song in itself
Is not what You have required
You search much deeper within
Through the way things appear
You're looking into my heart

[Verse]
I'm coming back to the heart of worship
And it's all about You
It's all about You, Jesus
I'm sorry, Lord, for the thing I've made it
When it's all about You
It's all about You, Jesus

title: YOU ARE MY REFUGE,

HERE I AM

I WILL SEEK YOUR FACE ALL THROUGH MY LIFE
I WILL SERVE YOU LORD WITH ALL THAT I HAVE
HERE I AM

HERE I AM

YOU ARE MY SHEPHERD
YOU ARE MY CONQUEROR
YOU ARE MY HIDING PLACE
YOU ARE MY God

[Chorus]
I WILL WORSHIP YOU WITH ALL OF MY HEART
I WILL SEEK YOUR FACE ALL THROUGH MY LIFE

title: ಇದುವರೆಗೂ ನನ್ನ ನಡೆಸಿದ್ದು ನಿನ್ನ ಕೃಪೆಯೇ ತಾನೆ
lyrics:
[Verse]
ಇದುವರೆಗೂ ನನ್ನ ನಡೆಸಿದ್ದು ನಿನ್ನ ಕೃಪೆಯೇ ತಾನೆ
ಇದುವರೆಗೂ ನನ್ನ ಕಾದುದ್ದು ನಿನ್ನ ಕೃಪೆಯೇ ತಾನೆ (೨)

Iduvaregu nanna nadesidhu
Ninna krupeye Thane
Iduvaregu nanna kaadhaddu
Ninna krupeye Thane (2)

[Verse]
ನಿನ್ನ ಕೃಪೆಯೇ ತಾನೆ (೪)
Ninna krupeye Thane (4)

[Verse]
ಪಾಪದ ಕೆಸರಲ್ಲಿ ಮುಳುಗಿದ್ದಾಗ ತೊಳೆದದ್ದು ನಿನ್ ಕೃಪೆಯೇ
ಸೈತಾನನ ಸುಳಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಸಿಲುಕಿದ್ದಾಗ ಬಿಡಿಸಿದ್ದು ನಿನ್ ಕೃಪೆಯೇ (೨)
ನೂತನ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಾಗಿ ನನ್ನ ಮಾಡಿದ್ದು
ನಿನ್ನ ಕೃಪೆಯೇ ತಾನೆ (೨)
ನಿತ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ನನ್ನ ಸೇರಿಸಿದ್ದು ನಿನ್ನ ಕೃಪೆಯೇ ತಾನೆ (೪)

Paapada kesaralli mulugiddhaga
Tholedaddu nin krupeye
Saithana suliyalli silukiddaga
Bidisiddu nin krupeye (2)
Nuthana shrustiyaagi nanna maadidhu
Ninna krupeye Thane (2)
Nithyadhalli nanna serisiddhu
Ninna krupeye Thane (4)

[Verse]
ಪ್ರತಿಯೊಂದು ಸ್ಥಿತಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಮುನ್ನಡೆಸಿದ್ದು
ನಿನ್ನ ಕೃಪೆಯೇ ತಾನೆ
ಅಗತ್ಯಗಳೆಲ್ಲವ ತೀರಿಸಿದ್ದು
ನಿನ್ನ ಕೃಪೆಯೇ ತಾನೆ (೨)
ಕೊರತೆಗಳೆಲ್ಲವ ನೀಗಿಸಿದ್ದು ನಿನ್ನ ಕೃಪೆಯೇ ತಾನೇ (೨)
ಕರ ಹಿಡಿದು ನನ್ನನ್ನು ನಡೆಸಿದ್ದು
ನಿನ್ನ ಕೃಪೆಯೇ ತಾನೆ (೪)

Prathiyondhu sthithiyalli munnadesidhu
Ninna krupeye Thane
Agatyagalellava theerisidhu
Ninna krupeye Thane (2)
Korethegalellava neegisidhu
Ninna krupeye Thane (2)
Karahididhu nannanu nadesidhu
Ninna krupeye Thane(4)

title: ಈ ಬಡವಳ ಬಾಳಲ್ಲಿ ಬೆಳಕಾಗಿ ಬಂದೆ ಯೇಸಯ್ಯಾ
lyrics:
[Verse]
ಈ ಬಡವಳ ಬಾಳಲ್ಲಿ ಬೆಳಕಾಗಿ ಬಂದೆ ಯೇಸಯ್ಯಾ
ಈ ದೀನಳ ಬಾಳನ್ನು ಮೇಲಕ್ಕೆ ಎತ್ತಿದೆ ಅಯ್ಯ – 2
1ಪ್ರೀತಿ ಪ್ರೀತಿ ಎಂದು ಹುಡುಕಲು
ನಿಜವಾದ ಪ್ರೀತಿ ಇಲ್ಲ – 2
ನಿನ್ ಪ್ರೀತಿಯೇ ನನಗೆ ಸಾಕಯ್ಯಾ
ಬೇರೇನೂ ಬೇಡ ಯೇಸಯ್ಯಾ – 2 || ಈ||

[Verse]
2ನಾ ನಂಬಿದಾ ನನ್ನವರೂ
ನನ್ನ ದಾರಿಗೆ ಮುಳ್ಳಾದರು – 2
ನಾ ಯಾರನ್ನು ನಂಬಲಿ ಯೇಸಯ್ಯಾ
ನಿನ್ನ ಬಿಟ್ಟರೆ ನನಗೆ ಯಾರಿಲ್ಲ – 2 || ಈ||

[Verse]
3ಈ ಲೋಕದಾ ಜನರೂ
ಮುಖ ನೋಡಿ ಪ್ರೀತಿಸುವರು -2
ನನ್ನ ಹೃದಯವಾ ನೋಡಿ ಪ್ರೀತಿಸಿದೆ
ನಿನ್ನಂತ ದೇವರು ಯಾರು ಇಲ್ಲ – 2

[Verse]
ಈ ಬಡವಳ ಬಾಳಲ್ಲಿ ಬೆಳಕಾಗಿ ಬಂದೆ ಯೇಸಯ್ಯಾ
ಈ ದೀನಳ ಬಾಳನ್ನು ಮೇಲಕ್ಕೆ ಎತ್ತಿದೆ ಅಯ್ಯ – 2
1ಪ್ರೀತಿ ಪ್ರೀತಿ ಎಂದು ಹುಡುಕಲು
ನಿಜವಾದ ಪ್ರೀತಿ ಇಲ್ಲ – 2
ನಿನ್ ಪ್ರೀತಿಯೇ ನನಗೆ ಸಾಕಯ್ಯಾ
ಬೇರೇನೂ ಬೇಡ ಯೇಸಯ್ಯಾ – 2 || ಈ||

title: ಉಸಿರಿರುವ ದಿನವೆಲ್ಲಾ ನಾಮಾಡುವೆ ನಿಮಗೆ ಆರಾಧನೆ
lyrics:
[Verse]
ಉಸಿರಿರುವ ದಿನವೆಲ್ಲಾ ನಾಮಾಡುವೆ ನಿಮಗೆ ಆರಾಧನೆ
ಆರಾಧನೆ ಆರಾಧನೆ ಆರಾಧನೆ
1 ಎಷ್ಟೊಂದು ಉಪಕಾರ ನನ್ನ ಜೀವಿತದಲ್ಲಿನೀಮಾಡಿರುವೆ ಯೇಸಯ್ಯಾ
ನನ್ನ ಪ್ರಾಣ ನೀ ನನ್ನ ಉಸಿರು ನೀ
ಎಂದೆಂದು ನಿಮಗೆ ಆರಾಧನೆ

[Chorus]
2 ಬಲವಿಲ್ಲದಿರುವಾಗ ನನ್ನನ್ನು ನೀ ಬಲಪಡಿಸಿದ್ದೀ ಯೇಸಯ್ಯ
ನನ್ನ ಬಲವು ನೀ ನನ್ನ ಬಂಡೆ ನೀ
ಎಂದೆಂದು ನಿಮಗೆ ಆರಾಧನೆ
ಆರಾಧನೆ ಆರಾಧನೆ ಆರಾಧನೆ

[Chorus]
3 ಹಸಿವಿನಲ್ಲಿರುವಾಗ ನನ್ನನ್ನು ನೀ
ಅನುದಿನವು ಪೋಷಿಸಿದ್ದೀ
ನನ್ನ ಪಾಲು ನೀ ನನ್ನ ಪಾನ ನೀ
ಎಂದೆಂದು ನಿಮಗೆ ಆರಾಧನೆ
ಆರಾಧನೆ ಆರಾಧನೆ ಆರಾಧನೆ

title: ನನ್ನೇಸು ರಾಜನು ಬರುವ
lyrics:
[Tag]
ನನ್ನೇಸು ರಾಜನು ಬರುವ
ನನ್ನೇಸು ರಾಜನು ಬರುವ
ಅಸಂಖ್ಯ ದೂತರೊಡನೆ
ನನ್ನನ್ನು ರಕ್ಷಿಸಿದ ಯೇಸು
ನನ್ನ ರಾಜನಾಗಿ ಬರುವ

[Verse]
1ಬಾನಲ್ಲಿ ಬೆಳಕು ಬೆಳಗಿ
ಬಾನಲ್ಲಿ ಮಿಂಚು ಮಿನುಗಿ ||
ಮೇಘಗಳೊಡನೆ ಇಳಿದು
ಮೇಘ ದೂತರೊಡನೆ ಬರುವ
|| ನನ್ನೇಸು ||

[Verse]
2ಕರ್ತನು ಬೇಗನೇ ಬರುವ
ನ್ಯಾಯ ತೀರ್ಪು ನಮಗೆ ಕೊಡುವ ||
ಅವರವರ ನಡತೆಯ ನೋಡಿ
ಪ್ರತಿಫಲವ ಕೊಡುವನು ನಮಗೆ ||

[Verse]
3ಕರ್ತನು ಬರುವ ದಿನವು ಭಕ್ತರಿಗೆ
ಆ ದಿನವು ತುಂಬಾನಂದವು ||
ಯಾರ್ಯಾರು ಸಿದ್ಧರಾಗಲಿಲ್ಲವೋ
ಆ ದಿನವು ತುಂಬ ದುಃಖಕರವು ||
ನನ್ನೇಸು ||

title: ಹಾ ಮನೋಹರ ಎಂದೂ ನಿನ್ನ ಆಲಯ
lyrics:
[Verse]
ಹಾ ಮನೋಹರ ಎಂದೂ ನಿನ್ನ ಆಲಯ
ಎಷ್ಟೋ ಆನಂದ ನಿನ್ನ ಅಂಗಳದಲ್ಲಿ – 2
ದೇವರೇ ನನ್ ತನು ಮನದಿಂದ
ಹಲ್ಲೇಲೂಯ ಹಾಡುವೆ - 2

Haa manohara endu Ninna Aalaya
Eshto Ananda Ninna angaLadalli – 2
Devare nan tanu manadinda
Halleluya haaduve - 2

[Verse]
ಯೇಸು ಒಳ್ಳೇವ ಎಲ್ಲಾರನ್ನು ಬಲ್ಲವ
ತನ್ ಮಕ್ಕಳಿಗೆಂದೂ ಆಶ್ರಯ – 2
ದೇವರೇ ನನ್ ತನು ಮನದಿಂದ
ಹಲ್ಲೇಲೂಯ ಹಾಡುವೆ - 2

Yesu oLLeva ellarannu ballava
Than makkaLigendu ashraya – 2
Devare nan tanu manadinda
Halleluya haaduve - 2

[Verse]
ನಿನ್ ವೇದಿಯ ಬಳಿಯಲ್ಲಿಯೇ ಎಂದೂ
ಗುಬ್ಬಿಗೆ ಮನೆಯೂ ಪಾರಿವಾಳಕ್ಕೆ ಗೂಡೂ –2
ದೊರಕಿದ ಹಾಗೆಯೇ ನನ್ನಯ ಮನವೂ
ಹೊಂದಲು ಬಯಸುವುದು - 2

Nin vediya baLiyalliye endu
Gubbige maneyu paarivaLakke goodu–2
Dorakida haageye nannaya manavu
Hondalu bayasuvudu - 2

This is my desire
To honor you
Lord will all my heart
I worship you
All I have with in me
I give you praise
All that I adore is in you

[Verse]
ನಿನ್ನ ಅಂಗಳದಲ್ಲಿ ಒಂದು ದಿನ
ಬೇರೆ ಸಹಸ್ರ ದಿನಕ್ಕಿಂತ ಉತ್ತಮವು –2
ದುಷ್ಟರ ಗುಡಾರಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ವಾಸಿಸುವದಕ್ಕಿಂತಾ
ನನ್ನ ದೇವರ ಅಲಯದ ಬಾಗಿಲು ಕಾಯುವುದೇ ಲೇಸು- 2

Ninna angaLadalli ondu dina
Bere sahasra dinakkintha uttamavu–2
Dushtara gudaaragaLalli vaasisuvadakkintha
Nanna Devara Alayada baagilu kAyuvude lesu- 2
